video.title: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
video.synopsis: Continuing the revered traditions of "Mr. Rogers' Neighborhood," this animated show for preschoolers is based on the adventures of young Daniel Tiger.

episodes.synopsis: Daniel is a little nervous about visiting school for the first time; Daniel isn't sure he's ready for his checkup with Dr. Anna.
episodes.title: Daniel Visits School / Daniel Visits the Doctor

episodes.synopsis: Prince Tuesday comes to babysit Daniel while Mom and Dad go out; Daniel joins his friends at school but doesn't want Dad to leave.
episodes.title: Daniel's Babysitter / Daniel Goes to School

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and Prince Wednesday get mad when rain cancels their plans to go to the beach; it's New Instrument Day at Music Man Stan's music shop.
episodes.title: Daniel Gets Mad / Katerina Gets Mad

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and Katerina Kittycat play "house" at school with Prince Wednesday; Daniel and O the Owl have a backwards play date at Miss Elaina's.
episodes.title: Prince Wednesday Finds a Way to Play / Finding a Way to Play on Backwards Day

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and Miss Elaina use their imaginations to play "outer space"; Daniel visits Prince Wednesday and gets a sneak peek at his rock collection.
episodes.title: Daniel and Miss Elaina Play Rocketship / Daniel Plays at the Castle

episodes.synopsis: Daniel spends the day at Katerina Kittycat's house; O the Owl and Daniel must use their imaginations to finish a book about dinosaurs.
episodes.title: Friends Help Each Other / Daniel Helps O Tell a Story

episodes.synopsis: Daniel decides to send Dad a letter and goes to the Post Office with Mom; Daniel surprises Mom with her favorite banana bread and visits a bakery.
episodes.title: Something Special for Dad / I Love You, Mom

episodes.synopsis: The Tiger family picks strawberries in the Enchanted Garden; Daniel, Miss Elaina and Katerina Kittycat visit a factory to see how crayons are made.
episodes.title: A Trip to the Enchanted Garden / A Trip to the Crayon Factory

episodes.synopsis: Daniel struggles to share his new toy car with his friends; Daniel and Katerina must share a tutu for their Jungle Dance show.
episodes.title: Daniel Shares his Tigertastic Car / Katerina Shares her Tutu

episodes.synopsis: Prince Wednesday doesn't want to stop what he's doing to go to the bathroom; Daniel uses the bathroom at Music Man Stan's shop.
episodes.title: Prince Wednesday Goes to the Potty / Daniel Goes to the Potty

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and his friends enjoy a Fruit Festival in the Enchanted Garden; Daniel tries to help Dad build a playhouse.
episodes.title: Fruit Picking Day / Daniel is Big Enough to Help Dad

episodes.synopsis: Daniel is excited to share a book he made with his class at "show and tell"; Daniel and his family are going out to dinner with Katerina.
episodes.title: Daniel Waits for Show and Tell / A Night Out at the Restaurant

episodes.synopsis: Daniel wants Grandpere Tiger to attend a special celebration; the neighborhood celebrates Thank You Day by putting notes in the Thank You Tree.
episodes.title: Thank You, Grandpere Tiger! / Neighborhood Thank You Day

episodes.synopsis: The Tiger family goes to Clock Factory Park to hear a big announcement from King Friday; Daniel and his classmates get to choose their new class pet.
episodes.title: The Neighborhood Votes / The Class Votes

episodes.synopsis: Teacher Harriet shows Daniel and his friends how to pick healthy veggies for their snack; Miss Elaina is having dinner with the Tiger family.
episodes.title: Be a Vegetable Taster! / Daniel Tries a New Food

episodes.synopsis: Daniel's imagination distracts him from getting to the trolley -- and to school -- on time; Daniel learns that even super heroes get sleepy.
episodes.title: Good Morning Daniel / Goodnight Daniel

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and his friends play ball at the park; at school, O the Owl is determined to build the tallest tower of blocks in the world.
episodes.title: Daniel Plays Ball / O Builds a Tower

episodes.synopsis: Daniel has to be brave when it's time to visit the doctor and get a shot; Daniel and O the Owl learn that thunderstorms aren't so scary after all.
episodes.title: Daniel Gets a Shot / A Stormy Day

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and his parents go to Prince Wednesday's castle for a family sleepover; Daniel and O the Owl go camping out in the yard with Dad Tiger.
episodes.title: Daniel's Sleepover / Backyard Camping

episodes.synopsis: The children are putting on a show about the things that make them special; a walk with Dad leads Daniel to wonder whether he's special.
episodes.title: You Are Special / Daniel is Special

episodes.synopsis: Daniel is excited to go to the bakery to pick out a cake for his birthday party; the rain ruins Daniel, Prince Wednesday and Miss Elaina's picnic.
episodes.title: Daniel's Birthday/Daniel's Picnic

episodes.synopsis: The children must all work together as a team to finish their art project; it's Teacher Harriet's birthday, and the children want to surprise her.
episodes.title: The Dragon Dance/Teacher Harriet's Birthday

episodes.synopsis: After losing his watch in a messy room, Daniel realizes that cleaning up will help him find it; a windstorm has made a mess of the playground.
episodes.title: Clean Up Time/Neighborhood Cleanup

episodes.synopsis: Teacher Harriet asks the children to play pretend with a cardboard box; Daniel's dad has forgotten to take his lunch to work with him.
episodes.title: Play Pretend/Super Daniel!

episodes.synopsis: When Mom Tiger is cleaning up, she accidentally ruins Daniel's game; the kids are playing "train" at school, but things aren't going Katerina's way.
episodes.title: Daniel Uses His Words/All Aboard!

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and Prince Wednesday top off a sand pie with Prince Tuesday's royal crown; Teacher Harriet teaches the children how to apologize to a friend.
episodes.title: The Royal Sandbox/Daniel Says I'm Sorry

episodes.synopsis: It's time to leave, but Katerina and Daniel are having fun; when Mom says it's time to work on a school project, Daniel doesn't want to stop playing.
episodes.title: It's Time to Go/Daniel Doesn’t Want to Stop Playing

episodes.synopsis: Prince Tuesday takes the class on a walk to practice safety rules; the kids get carried away with playing on the beach and drift too far from Mom.
episodes.title: Safety Patrol/Safety at the Beach

episodes.synopsis: Daniel learns how one kind act can lead to many after his first good deed starts a chain reaction of kindness all around the neighborhood.
episodes.title: Neighbor Day

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and his friends are visiting Dad Tiger's clock factory; the children are going to the library, and all the excitement is making them silly.
episodes.title: Calm at the Clock Factory/Calm for Storytime

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and Miss Elaina meet Prince Wednesday's cousin; while playing dress-up at school, Daniel realizes that not everyone has a tail like him.
episodes.title: Daniel's New Friend/Same and Different

episodes.synopsis: Katerina is having trouble deciding on the right costume for Dress-Up Day; on Dress-Up Day, the kids celebrate at the annual Main Street parade.
episodes.title: Katerina's Costume/Dress Up Day

episodes.synopsis: It's Snowflake Day, and Daniel has a very important role as the snowflake in the neighborhood's Snowflake Day show. He can't wait to say his lines!
episodes.title: Snowflake Day!

episodes.synopsis: When it's time to play in the snow, Mom helps Daniel choose warm clothes; Katerina likes to wear her tutu all the time, even when she's painting.
episodes.title: A Snowy Day/Tutu All the Time

episodes.synopsis: Daniel doesn't want to miss a school party, but he is not feeling well; when Mom Tiger catches a cold, Dad and Daniel help so she can rest.
episodes.title: Daniel Gets a Cold/Mom Tiger is Sick

episodes.synopsis: The children find out that Ducky has grown too big to be their pet; Daniel feels left out when he learns O and Katerina have been playing without him.
episodes.title: Duckling Goes Home/Daniel Feels Left Out

episodes.synopsis: Daniel gets frustrated when it seems like he's unable to do anything he wants to do; Daniel is upset when he can't find the toy he is looking for.
episodes.title: Daniel Gets Frustrated/Frustration at School

episodes.synopsis: Daniel thinks Grandpere is paying too much attention to Katerina; Daniel and Katerina are jealous of O because he has a new science kit.
episodes.title: Daniel Is Jealous/Jealousy at the Treehouse

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and O are pretending to be handymen, but Daniel's hammering is upsetting O; Chrissie loses her bracelet and doesn’t feel like playing anymore.
episodes.title: Someone Else's Feelings/Empathy at School

episodes.synopsis: Daniel is disappointed when he doesn't get the classroom job he wanted; X needs to go to the doctor, so Daniel and his mom fill in as librarians.
episodes.title: Line Leader Daniel/Neighborhood Jobs

episodes.synopsis: Daniel learns that he is going to be a big brother; Helping to set up the baby's room, Daniel is unsure about whether to part with his old belongings.
episodes.title: The Tiger Family Grows / Daniel Learns About Being a Big Brother

episodes.synopsis: Daniel shows Grandpère the new baby's room, then they take the trolley to the hospital, where big brother Daniel meets his baby sister, Margaret.
episodes.title: The Baby Is Here

episodes.synopsis: Daniel is upset when Daddy cares for Margaret instead of playing with him; Prince Wednesday visits, but spends time with the baby instead of Daniel.
episodes.title: Time for Daniel / There's Time for Daniel and Baby Too

episodes.synopsis: A curious baby Margaret interrupts Daniel's playtime with O and Katerina; Mommy and Daddy teach Daniel how to include the baby in his playground fun.
episodes.title: Playtime Is Different / The Playground Is Different with Baby

episodes.synopsis: Daniel accidentally breaks Trolley's wheel, and Mommy urges him to try fixing it himself; Miss Elaina and Daniel work together to fix a broken toy.
episodes.title: Daniel Fixes Trolley / Problem Solver Daniel

episodes.synopsis: Daniel learns about having fun alone when Miss Elaina would rather read than play with him; The princes don't want Daniel to join their playtime.
episodes.title: Daniel's Friends Say No / Prince Wednesday Doesn't Want to Play

episodes.synopsis: Daniel and Prince Wednesday go sledding with Dad Tiger and Prince Tuesday; Prince Wednesday asks Daniel to take his place in The Nutcracker ballet.
episodes.title: Daniel's Winter Adventure / Neighborhood Nutcracker

episodes.synopsis: Daniel's class celebrates Love Day, and he receives a secret admirer card; Daniel plans a Love Day surprise for Grandpère, then gets his own.
episodes.title: It's Love Day! / Daniel's Love Day Surprise

episodes.synopsis: Daniel's family heads outdoors, where he learns how birds build nests; The Owls go for a nature walk with Daniel and are surprised by a rainbow!
episodes.title: Daniel Explores Nature / Daniel's Nature Walk

episodes.synopsis: Miss Elaina and Daniel play "astronauts" and crash into each other; After Daniel twists his ankle, Mom takes him to Dr. Anna for an X-ray.
episodes.title: Miss Elaina Gets Hurt/Daniel Feels Better
